name: Submarine (SquareDev)
description:
This is the first game I ever made!

Yes, it's a Copter clone, and a bad one at that. But it's the first thing I managed to put togther by myself with the limited knowledge I had.

Unzip the files and open submarine.exe to play!

The only control in the game is the Space Bar. press it to go up, release to go down. That's it. Hope you'll enjoy it even for a minute.
